meanings.definition: A person who tramples on something.
meanings.sent1: The tramplers left footprints all over the freshly planted garden.
meanings.sent2: The herd of elephants were the tramplers of the tall grass in the savanna.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children pretended to be tramplers of the imaginary kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The tramplers of tradition crushed any new ideas that came their way.
meanings.sent5: The tramplers of justice will eventually face consequences for their actions.
